item.title: Ben add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "No matter where; of comfort no man speak: Let's talk of graves, of worms, and epitaphs; Make dust our paper and with rainy eyes Write sorrow on the bosom of the earth" -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Ben add a quote by Joseph Conrad
item.description: "We live in the flicker -- may it last as long as the old earth keeps rolling! But darkness was here yesterday." -- Joseph Conrad

item.title: Ben add a quote by Philip Gourevitch
item.description: "The piled-up dead of political violence are a generic staple of our information diet these days, and according to the generic report all massacres are created equal: the dead are innocent, the killers monstrous, the surrounding politics insane or nonexistent...The anonymous dead and their anonymous killers become their own context. The horror becomes absurd." -- Philip Gourevitch
